title: The Binding of Isaac : Rebirth - Save Game Importer
description:
This tool will import your save at any place you are !

Isaac Save Importer v1

===== INSTRUCTIONS (ENGLISH) =====

1.	Put the IsaacSaveImporter.exe file in the root of your game.
2.	Be sure that you have a savedatapath.txt file in your game directory.
3.	Open the savedatapath.txt file.
4.	Please note your save path.
	==== EXAMPLE SAVEDATAPATH.TXT ====
	Save Data Path: C:UsersBernard/Documents/My Games/Binding of Isaac Rebirth/

5. Copy your save in the folder that SAVEDATAPATH.TXT specify.	
	For me it's : C:UsersBernard/Documents/My Games/Binding of Isaac Rebirth/
	
6. Run IsaacSaveImporter.exe and enjoy your game !
